scripts.pub:major: pnpm run watchdog:build && lerna publish major --yes --force-publish --exact --no-changelog

scripts.pub:prepatch: pnpm run watchdog:build && lerna publish prepatch --force-publish --exact --dist-tag beta --preid beta --no-changelog
